title: Teaching Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Jacobs University (Bremen, Bremen) in Jan 2023
Interview Descriptions: You send a written application, after which the supervisor contacts you. The interview consists of checking relevant experiences and some scenario-based questions. Overall, it took no more than 30 minutes.
Interview Questions: If you had a question from a student, and you didn't know how to answer it, how would you respond?

title: Teaching Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Jacobs University (Bremen, Bremen) in Sept 2022
Interview Descriptions: I had an interview more like a conversation, it went very well and it was really relaxing because the recruiters were very friendly and warm-welcoming. I was very honest with whatever they've been asking and tried to tell more details about what have I written on my CV.
Interview Questions: Tell us about yourself Describe your achievements.

title: Teaching Assitant Interview
Interview Descriptions: It was not complicated and depends on the professor. You need to have good grades though if you want to be one. Also be prepared for every kind of question that you never had from students.
Interview Questions: Asked for CV and grades and transcript

title: Teaching Assistant Interview
Interview Descriptions: Very nice interview. Very good interviewer. Smooth process and interesting topics discussed. Very in-depth as well. Very nice to work with students who are passionate about the subject as well as their colleagues.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Recruitment Counselor Interview
Interview Descriptions: Das Video Gespräch mit HR und zwei Kollegen läuft gut und reibungslos. Es hat ungefähr 30-40 Minuten gedauert. Terminvereinbarung war nicht kompliziert. Nach ungefähr 3 Wochen habe ich ein Absage bekommen.
Interview Questions: Selbstpräsentation. Meine Vorstellung für die Stelle. Wie man eine unerwartete Situation handeln. Ideales Job

title: Software Entwickler Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Jacobs University (Bremen, Bremen) in Sept 2021
Interview Descriptions: Die Jacobs Universität ist nicht zu dem Microsoft Teams Meeting erschienen, zu dem sie mich für das Vorstellungsgespräch eingeladen haben. Sie haben das Gespräch anscheinend vergessen oder kamen mehr als eine halbe Stunde zu spät, da ich nicht länger warten wollte.
Interview Questions: Keine Frage wurde gestellt, da das Gespräch von Seiten der Universität vergessen wurde.

title: College Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Jacobs University (Bremen, Bremen) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions:
Easy and smoothly
. Plastic waste, however, and in particular plastic waste in the context of marine littering, is a major global challenge. There is also increasing regulatory pressure regarding recycling targets and recyclability on the one hand and strong commitments of our customers towards increasing the share of recycled material in their offerings on the other hand. Solving these challenges requires innovation and joint efforts g

title: Teaching Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Jacobs University (Bremen, Bremen) in Aug 2019
Interview Descriptions: I had sent my CV to the Professor, and she has known be before since she had me in her programming course and I was one of the best students, so she just asked me to do it without an interview.

title: Lehrassistent Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Jacobs University (Bremen, Bremen)
Interview Descriptions: Ich wurde nach meinem Antrag zu einem Vorstellungsgespräch eingeladen. Die Mitarbeiter haben sich vorgestellt und es wurde mir einfach über meine Erfahrungen und Fähigkeiten gefragt, und meine Sprach Fähigkeiten wurden auch getestet.

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Jacobs University (Bremen, Bremen) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: Just casual talk with one of my professors, he is nice and willing to offer me an internship. He talked about the stipend, and the plans for our projects, my role in the whole research group and so on.
Interview Questions: Have you got any experience before?

title: Student Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Jacobs University
Interview Descriptions: First it starts off with a motivational letter, just generally trying to set yourself apart from the other Applicants. The interviewers are very friendly, and introduce themselves and the job at the very beginning, giving you time to adjust to the interview. The questions asked were generally behavior question, e.g. how did you overcome a challenge etc. The whole interview lasted around 45 minutes, but it seemed much shorter since it was very engaging.
Interview Questions: Preparing a short presentation about the University which you should give to prospective students.

title: Doktorand Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Jacobs University (Bremen, Bremen) in Sept 2009
Interview Descriptions: keine, nur auf die akademische Transkript und den Lebenslauf basiert, unter der Voraussetzung, dass man einen Abschluss als B.Sc. auf dem Moment der Bewerbung hat.
Interview Questions: erwarte einen PhD Vorschlag nach 8 Monaten
